thread.title: Historic 665-point Dow plunge rocks Wall Street

title: Historic 665-point Dow plunge rocks Wall Street
text:
Historic 665-point Dow plunge rocks Wall Street   01:57 
The Dow Jones Industrial Average suffered one of its worst one-day point slumps in history, capping the biggest weekly drop since 2016, after a surge in borrowing costs sparked a mass exodus from stocks.   
The Dow Jones Industrial Average suffered one of its worst one-day point slumps in history, capping the biggest weekly drop since 2016, after a surge in borrowing costs sparked a mass exodus from stocks.  //reut.rs/2DWMQk3
